title: Grilled Chicken Breast with Herbs
description: Juicy grilled chicken breast seasoned with fresh herbs.
instructions: Marinate chicken breast with olive oil, garlic, and herbs. Grill on medium heat for 6-8 minutes per side until fully cooked.

title: Spaghetti with Tomato and Basil
description: Classic Italian spaghetti with fresh tomatoes and basil.
instructions: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions. In a pan, sauté garlic, add tomatoes and cook until soft. Toss in cooked spaghetti and fresh basil.

title: Salmon with Lemon and Dill
description: Baked salmon with fresh lemon slices and dill for a refreshing taste.
instructions: Place salmon on a baking tray, season with salt, pepper, lemon slices, and dill. Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

title: Stir-fried Shrimp with Garlic and Chili
description: Spicy and flavorful stir-fried shrimp with garlic and chili.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add garlic and chili. Stir-fry shrimp until pink and fully cooked.

title: Zucchini Noodles with Parmesan
description: Healthy zucchini noodles topped with freshly grated Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Spiralize the zucchini into noodles. Sauté with olive oil, garlic, and top with Parmesan cheese.

title: Avocado and Egg Breakfast
description: Simple and nutritious avocado with boiled eggs.
instructions: Boil eggs for 10 minutes. Cut avocado in half and serve with boiled eggs, salt, and pepper.

title: Beef Stir-fry with Broccoli
description: Tender beef strips stir-fried with fresh broccoli in a soy sauce glaze.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry beef until browned, then add broccoli and soy sauce. Cook until tender.

title: Tomato and Mozzarella Salad
description: Fresh tomato and mozzarella salad with a drizzle of olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange on a plate, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

title: Baked Cod with Garlic Butter
description: Flaky baked cod with a delicious garlic butter sauce.
instructions: Place cod in a baking dish, top with garlic butter. Bake at 180°C for 15-20 minutes.

title: Chicken and Rice Stir-fry
description: Stir-fried chicken with rice, soy sauce, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Cook rice. Stir-fry chicken and vegetables in a pan with soy sauce. Mix with cooked rice.
